name: SphereHandleAdornment
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A sphere-shaped handle that can be adorned to a Class.BasePart.
description: |
  SphereHandleAdornment is a sphere-shaped handle that can be adorned to a
  Class.BasePart. If parented to a player's Class.PlayerGui or the
  Class.CoreGui, handles can listen to input events for purposes such as
  making dragger tools.
